verbs.description: [ARG0: jcpenney ceo] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: signaled] [ARG1: the end of retail as we know it marvin ellison who became the ceo of jcpenney in 2015 after a 12-year stint at home depot was responsible for bringing the department store back from the brink of disaster now he leaving for an industry that considered safer from the threat of amazon ceo marvin ellison globaldata retail]
